title: Bravo's Love Hotel
overview: Bravo's Love Hotel brings together some of "The Real Housewives" franchise fan favorites for the ultimate luxurious getaway in the hopes of finding true love. The ladies will head to the Grand Velas Boutique Hotel in Los Cabos, Mexico, where they will mix and mingle with a group of eligible bachelors, each vying for the chance to win their hearts and put the "wives" back in "Housewives."
